entry.content:
Hi, I’m Rija Shaheed 
A proactive software engineer and master’s student in Information Systems at the University of Münster. I specialize in building intuitive, scalable, and user-friendly applications using React.js, Node.js, and the MERN stack. My experience ranges from developing mobile apps to creating ERP and CRM integration solutions that streamline business processes.
